participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and introspective, Alex enjoys the simple pleasures in life and appreciates the art of storytelling through film.
participant_1.background: My favorite thing to do on the weekends is to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films. I work at a bar. My family is small, and we don't have a lot of money. My favorite websites are pet health sites, especially ones with information on poodles. My mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

participant_2.name: Jasmine Lee
participant_2.personality: Jasmine is focused and nurturing, finding joy in activities that promote health and connection with others.
participant_2.background: I made a delicious cake for my friends and family to celebrate my birthday. I'm not too interested in social media; I'd rather be focusing on my yoga and finding a partner to spend my life with. I have two siblings. My favorite singer is Justin Timberlake. I have to live by a schedule in order to keep my mind right.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy yoga, and making delicious food for my friends and family.
That's cool. I like to watch foreign films and relax with my band t-shirts.
What kind of foreign films do you like?
I like movies from all over the world, but my favorites are Japanese and Korean films.
I've never seen a Japanese film, but I love Korean films! They're so beautiful and emotional.
Yeah, they're amazing! Have you seen the movie "Oldboy"?
Yes! I loved that movie. It was so intense and well-made.
It's one of my favorites. I also really like the movie "The Handmaiden". It's a Korean film about a woman who becomes a handmaid for a wealthy Japanese man.
I've heard good things about that movie. I'll have to check it out.
I think I will. Thanks for the recommendation!
